original_text: But when Sanballat, Tobiah, the Arabs, the Ammonites and the people of Ashdod heard that the repairs to Jerusalem’s walls had gone ahead and that the gaps were being closed, they were very angry.
korean_text: 산발랏과 도비야와 아라비아 사람들과 암몬 사람들과 아스돗 사람들이 예루살렘 성이 중수되어 그 허물어진 틈이 메꾸어져 간다 함을 듣고 심히 분노하여

sentences.original_text: But when Sanballat, Tobiah, the Arabs, the Ammonites and the people of Ashdod heard
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 산발랏과 도비아와 아라비아 사람들과 암몬 사람들과 아스돗 사람들이 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: that the repairs to Jerusalem's walls had gone ahead
and that the gaps were being closed
